name: Parasomnum
description:
Enter a minimalistic, low-poly horror world and try to make it out alive.

Navigate a maze-like map filled with unsettling, repetitive ambiance.

Encounter terrifying apparitions that can end your journey.

Explore the depths of fear in this debut game that offers 25 to 90 minutes of suspenseful gameplay.

Be among the first to play this game and have an impact on future updates!

Note: Though this game does not feature procedural generation, some aspects are randomly generated, allowing for richer replayability.
